thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 7 of 183
thread.title: Susan Eskelin

author: Susan Eskelin
title: Susan Eskelin
text: We are a small company and love the convenience and results of Zip Recruiter for our last 6 position fills. The website is easy to use, the staff friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. My last interaction with Desirea with the online chat was easy, quick, effective and even with typed dialogue, her pleasant demeanor was conveyed. This is just one more positive experience with Zip Recruiter. Thank you for the great employees who live close to our office!
